content: Hanger MFT-HAF 80 T ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Accessories for façade systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster, simpler cladding installation – improved hanger design for hassle-free panel installation Single panel removal – these redesigned hangers are not only easier to install, but also allow you to remove single cladding panels (when fastened with fixing pins) All-weather installation – unlike adhesives, you can work with this system in virtually all weather conditions Engineering support available – contact your local Hilti team for project-specific advice on optimizing the ventilated façade substructure Total system solution – from Hilti you get optimized tools, consumables and services for every step of ventilated façade installation Applications Concealed fastening of façade cladding using undercut anchors ### TECHNICAL DATA: Height: 63.5 mm Length: 80 mm Material composition: Aluminum EN AW-6063 T66 Technical Data | Height | 63.5 mm | Length | 80 mm | Material composition | Aluminum EN AW-6063 T66 ### ITEMS- 2301603 - Hanger MFT-HAF 80 T - Package Size 100 pc
